author: cms-ngt-hlt
body: #### PR description: Follow-up of #48722, including: + 1D and 2D multiplicity plots, with and without pT bins + Resolution tails (gaussian core fit taken from [here](https://gitlab.cern.ch/dkarasav/pfpatatrackvalidation/-/blob/master/ProducerTest/C_scripts/Plot_resolution_and_response_histos.C) + Errors cutoff whenever the errobars go above 1 or below 0 + Minor optimizations Some examples: #### PR validation: Validated using the same configuration as in #48722.
title: [NGT] Jet Validation for Phase-2 HLT: Part 2
